scripts.build:with-box-extractor:
echo 'Running vite build WITH ✅  @box-extractor/vanilla-extract optimizations...
' && start_time=`date +%s` && vite build && end_time=`date +%s` && echo build execution time was `expr $end_time - $start_time` s. && echo '
-----------------------'
scripts.build:without-box-extractor:
echo 'Running vite build WITHOUT ❌ @box-extractor/vanilla-extract optimizations...
' && start_time=`date +%s` && vite --config=./vite.config.without-box-extractor.ts build && end_time=`date +%s` && echo build execution time was `expr $end_time - $start_time` s. && echo '
-----------------------'
